MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Awelfryn, Liverpool Terrace, Moriah Terrace and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:15pm due to a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:47pm on 2nd December 2020.
